title: (5450-004) Vila Pouca de Aguiar - 9 Avenida General Humberto Delgado
title_short: (5450-004) Vila Pouca de Aguiar - 9 Avenida General Humberto Delgado
description: Parking lot in front of GNR where you can park day and night except on holidays, 5 and 25 of each month

title: (5450) Vila Pouca de Aguiar - 39 N212
description: Drinking water point, access is not easy, not recommended for large vehicles. Located in the picnic area of the sanctuary.

title: (5450) Mesão Frio - 38 Avenida Doutor Carlos Alberto de Sousa

address.street: 38 Avenida Doutor Carlos Alberto de Sousa

title: (5450) Mesão Frio - 22 Rua Doutor Alberto Rodrigues
title_short: (5450) Mesão Frio - 22 Rua Doutor Alberto Rodrigues
description: Self service laundry in the parking lot of a super market and next to a low cost fuel pump.

title: (5450) - A7
description: Local for rest and possible sleeping overnight next to highway.

name: ALVAO VILLAGE CAMPING
title: (5450) ALVAO VILLAGE CAMPING
description: Nice campsite with good toilets, good swimming pool. Very clean. Ideal for families with children as it has a swimming pool and children's play area.

title: (5450) Soutelo de Aguiar - EM555
description: Big parking in front of a little parque by a lake with piquenique tables under trees and a little cafe by the side. We loved it for a lunchbreak close to the autostrada. Portuguese families bring their grandma's here for a walk around the lake and a piquenique.

title: (5450) - CM1160-1
description: Great and calm place near the EN2 and the ruins of Castelo da Pena de Aguiar. Amazing landscape. With public toilets almost perfectly clean.

title: (5450) - 12 Avenida Lopes Oliveira
description: Quiet place to spend the night, without services, next to the Centro de Saúde. Not recommended for vehicles over 7 meters. It is worth to visit the thermal park and the gardens of seus.

title: (5450) Mesão Frio - 13 EM549
description: Parking place in Pedras Salgadas. Close to a road but quiet at night. Next to tables and water. Also nice to visit the urban park, spa and drink natural sparkling water from a spring fountain. Equestrian center near by.

title: (5450) Tresminas - Unnamed Road
description: Good quiet area to spend the night and as a starting point to visit the Roman mines, walks in the mountains near a climbing area in Vilarelho.

title: (4870) Ribeira de Pena - CM1132
description: Spectacular views. There are several taps and none of them have water. There are no containers, but there are litter bins nearby, in the church. Residential and quiet place.

title: (4870) Ribeira de Pena - 765 N312
description: Service area and simple parking. Filling water with token and playground for small children, shops nearby, good walk on the bridge.

title: (5000-781) Vilarinho de Samardã -
description: A good pull in to stop to admire the view and have a picnic. Very peaceful.

title: (4870) - Unnamed Road
description: Park parking "Pene Aventura".  Night possible without problem.  If you share in the activities of the park, you have free hot water and showers.  You can enjoy one of the best zip lines in the world!

title: (4870) Ribeira de Pena Portugalia - 2 Rua do Rapaduro
title_short: (4870) Ribeira de Pena Portugalia - 2 Rua do Rapaduro
description: less than a kilometer from the highway, 7 picnic tables, small horizontal parking lot at the side of the road, a shallow river to cool off in, a barbecue area with grill.

title: (5445) Padrela e Tazém - 6 Rua Er 206
description: Simple, practically level parking lot located by the roadside illuminated at night with some shade. 2 picnic tables. Large enough to accept several large motorhomes. A fountain with a tap and standard screw allows filling with water. No emptying service.

title: (5000-781) Vilarinho de Samardã -
description: source of drinking water

title: (5000) São Tomé do Castelo - 2191 R Principal
title_short: (5000) São Tomé do Castelo - 2191 R Principal
description: Parking day parking next to a grocery bar and a cemetery! ideal for visiting the very quiet and pleasant village

title: (5070) - Unnamed Road
description:
Nice viewpoint on the top of a village! The access is a very inclined road but short distance. Either you can park next to the chapel where there is a small flat area or a bit before on the left, a area with more space and more flat. Good running water inside the area of the chapel and a small "cave" next to it.
I didn't stayed over night but for sure no problem!

title: (4870) Limões - CM1142
description: A nice little flat land by the road can frequent, ideal for a night

title: (4870) Ribeira de Pena - N206
description: Place next to a mountain road, beautiful views of the river and suitable for a stop to eat or rest in the shade of the trees.

title: (4870) Ribeira de Pena - N312
description: Outside the campsite. Simple stop night, calm, flat.

title: (5090) - R314
description: Picnic area with barbecue and water. No problem to stay over night.

title: (5425) Vidago - 21 Rua Faria de Morais
description: We parked here to visit Vidago, it's possible to park over night (no prohibited signs)

title: (5000) Mesão Frio - N2
description: Nice spot for a picnic during the road trip for the EN2

title: (4870) Ribeira de Pena - 1873 N206
description:
Park next to the road with plenty of space. A little uneven. It has a tap with water, 2 barbecues and bathrooms (they were closed when I was there).
Good view over the dam.
quiet place

title: (4870) Mesão Frio - 19 N312
description: Area in the town of Cerva. All services, playground. River pool in the village. very quiet

title: (5090) Murça - Unnamed Road
description: Spacious asphalt parking lot on top of the hill. A little bit uneven.

title: (5090) Murça - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful lookout of Murça village. No worries to stay overnight.

title: (4860) - Unnamed Road
description: Park at a wonderfull  fluvial beach, picnic tables, grill ,bath, very calm And peacefull place, no problems staying at night!

title: () Murça - Variante à N15
description: On the parking of the municipal stadium of Murca. Very warm welcome by the caretaker who allowed us to spend the night. Near the city, even if it has little interest. Now upgraded with free fresh water, sewage for grey and dark waters.

title: (5445) Carrezedo de Montenegro - 28 R206
description: Picnic area in a new activity zone. 5 tables, games for children, city stadium, possible to spend the night, slightly sloping. For the moment lacks shade.

title: (4880) - EM1344
description: Surrounded by local nature, including wheat fields, churrasqueira and picnic areas. Quiet enough to spend the night.

title: (5000) Lamas de Olo - EM313
description: Large parking place at the bottom of the beautiful village of Lamas de Olo. Quite and nice, surrounded by nature, walking marked trail (13k), river nearby, drinking water and toilets (next to cemetery). I have no photos though. Worth to spend a night

title: (5000-751) Mouçós - 135 Rua Central
description: Parking in front of a small chapel at the entrance to the village. Place for two or three CC. Flat, without any services. We spent one night, no noise except some dogs barking

title: (5460) Seirraos - CM1038
description: Near Boticas Magnificent Mirradouro point of view for a stopover or a night, unfortunately, part of the forest is burnt but the view is beautiful.

title: (4880) - 1973 EM1191-1
description:
This is a place allowed by the Alvão Park. We where sent here by the guard. It’s a market place in a village called Bilhó. 
==
Este local é autorizado pelo Parque do Alvão, fomos enviados pela Guarda para aqui após termos sido apanhado junto à capela.

title: (5000) Vila Real - EM313
description: Picnic area near the dam water reservoir, in the heart of the national park. Ideal for a short stopover for lunch. No services. It is forbidden to spend the night in the park

title: (4880) Bilhó - M1200
description: Time for a break ! Small parking close to a waterfall with possibility to ”swim” and enjoy the sun !

title: (5070) Vila Chã - N212
description: Quiet place for a night surrounded by nature. Easy to reach. A sports field and a cemetery are nearby.

title: (4860) - N206
description: Praia fluvial de cavez excellent place to rest ... Praia nas margens do rio tamega

title: (5000) Vila Real -
description: Nice little nature spot next to the dam. The road is in good shape. And the place is sheltered from the wind. You take can nice little walks from the spot

title: (5460) Boticas - 14 Largo Nossa Senhora da Livração
title_short: (5460) Boticas - 14 Largo Nossa Senhora da Livração
description: Free paarking, police station next door. beutifull place.historical village. No facilities. Everything you need get around.

title: (5460) - 55 R311
description: A flat location, ideal for spending a night alone and green. starting point for a nice family stroll in a bucolic place. No service but it is not the goal.

title: (5060) - 5 CM1262
description: Drinking water from source! Very nice. It fills 13l in 30 seconds.

title: (5000) Lamas de Olo - EM313
description: Water fountain. The local population fills their big bottle of water. So I guess it's safe to drink. But at least can be used for dishes, shower etc.

name: Parque de Campismo - Virgílio António de Miranda
title: (5460-304) Parque de Campismo - Virgílio António de Miranda
title_short: (5460-304) Parque de Campismo - Virgílio António de Miranda

title: (5460-304) Boticas - 55 Avenida Chaves
description: Car park away from the football stadium. Ideal for a quiet night

title: (4880) - Unnamed Road
description: Parking in front of a chapel in the middle of town. We stayed here after we were kicked out of the natural park. Quiet area and close to the Pozas de Ermelo

title: (5425-011) Anelhe -
description: Relaxed place to stand. No facilities. But very peaceful

title: (5000) Vila Real - EM313
description: At the edge of the road (can frequented) placement small but superb view. No good service for one night

title: (5000) Vila Real - 67 Rua da Vila Paulista
title_short: (5000) Vila Real - 67 Rua da Vila Paulista
description: Washer and dryer

title: (5000) Vila Real -
description: It is next door to Decathlon, the hypermarket and the combustion pump. This manual is available in the city center. Very calm for one night. During the day as a hypermarket it is moving a lot. Washing and drying machines inside Intermarché

title: (5000) Vila Real - EM313
description: Location close to the road but totally isolated and silent. No services. A few kilometers above Villa Real on which you have a breathtaking view. The path to get there is rather dented and is accessible only to small cars or vans. The place is clean and we are counting on you to do the rest (remember to pick up all your waste including your toilet paper).

title: (5060) Delgada - Rua de São Brás
description: Beekeeping farm with views of the Douro Region and the Douro Valley. We are in a very small and quiet village, off the route of the mass tourism of the Douro. We offer the possibility of spending the night for free on our farm next to our centenary chestnut trees. Water point and shadows. We accept pets and you can have barbecues. Possibility of visiting the apiary and dressing up as a beekeeper. Phone number available for PRO subscribers.

title: (5000) Vila Real -
description: Quiet place with a beautiful view. We stayed 2 nights and would definitely come back.

title: (5000) Vila Real - Rua Jaime Campos
description: Parking near Vila Real. Quiet. Without services Cafeterias nearby.

title: (5460) Sapiãos - N103
description: A dead end hidden behind bushes and trees not too close to the road. An ok place to sleep for the night.

title: (5000-305) Vila Real - Rua de Santa Iria
title_short: (5000-305) Vila Real - Rua de Santa Iria
description: A good place to go to night. If you don't like cemeteries, don't come because it's next to you.

title: (5060) Sabrosa -
description: Quiet parking in the middle of nature for 2 vans next to a small building (water reserve style) without any service (except 4G). Completely passable dirt path for a van. Please leave the place clean and bring your trash.

title: (5460) - 46 N103
description: Lovely views of hills and mountains. Very peaceful. Surrounded by nature. Next to a road, 10 metres away, but quiet, particularly at night.

title: (5445) -
description: Parking lot of '' Altar de sacrifícios, '' in Argeriz. large lot on flat grass or almost with large trees and picnic tables and bins and another open area ... all with a beautiful view of the valley

title: (5000-410) Vila Real - 16 Rua de Montezelos
description: Automatic laundromat! very clean and very practical. There is a monaural for the exchange of banknotes. Laundry is included. TV and free WiFi. Air conditioning can be parked in front near the electrical transformer

title: (5000-557) Vila Real - 31 Avenida da Europa
description: Overview of the time in the trees, the time of departure and the duration of the harvest (Junho a Setembro).  Most cases can be solved.  Muito calmo.  Free

title: (5000) Vila Real - Rua Padre Miranda
description: Parking behind the church overlooking the vineyards and close to the Mateus Manor. No service but a little shade.

title: (5000) Vila Real - 133 Rua das Flores
description: Small car park opposite the manor of Mateus, on the place of the wash-house. Access quite narrow. 2/3 places. Quiet but traffic noise from 6am in the morning.

name: Vila Real Camping
title: (5000-557) Vila Real Camping
description: The campsite is about 1 km from the town center on a hill with lots of trees. squares. There is everything you need. The place is clean and well managed. Very friendly welcome.

title: () Vila Real - N322-1
description: Parking for 2 motorhomes without any service. View over the vines.

title: (5000) Galegos Da Serra - EM1214
description: Park/picnic place with magnificient view on Vila Real.

title: (5460) Boticas - N103
description: Picnic area with nice view and continuous source of drinking water. slight slope Calm at night, traffic resumes around 7:30 am Let's try to keep the place clean.

title: (5000-542) Vila Real - Rua Actor Ruy de Carvalho
title_short: (5000-542) Vila Real - Rua Actor Ruy de Carvalho
description: Parking at the entrance to Parque do Corgo. In addition to shopping. Very peaceful place where we could spend 2 fantastic nights. Drinking water is available free of charge, but barrels are required for filling. No unloading points.

title: (5460) Sapiãos - Bairro Tornadouro
description: A space for relaxation and leisure, possibility of parking day and night for free, very quiet

title: (4880) Ermelo - Unnamed Road
description: Starting point to the waterfalls 'Fisgas de Ermelo'

title: (5000-651) Vila Real - 13 Praceta Dom João Evangelista
title_short: (5000-651) Vila Real - 13 Praceta Dom João Evangelista
description: Residential parking with plenty of free spaces, more or less flat and very close to the center. It is payable on weekdays (0.60 an hour until 7:00 p.m.) We have slept here without problems.

title: (5000-751) - Rua Central
description: Nice flat parking behind a small chapel. a short walk to the Panoias Sanctuary. plenty of room very quiet.

title: (5000) Vila Real - 38 Avenida 5 de Outubro
description: Around the park and playground for children, there is room to park the motorhome. We did not spend the night because there was a student party for the carnival in a tent in the university area and there was a lot of noise but on another date that did not have the party, the place is very good, you cross the bridge and you are in the historic center, walking, in ten minutes you are there. The place that puts another partner we used to sleep but is far from the city.

title: (5000-651) Vila Real - 58 Rua da Fonte Nova
title_short: (5000-651) Vila Real - 58 Rua da Fonte Nova
description: Next to the very calm primary school. 10 minutes walk from the city center.

title: (5000-573) Mesão Frio -
description: Parking very basic, but convenient for large vehicles, no shade. and close to the auto circuit (during the wtcr) for access to the paddocks.

title: (5070) - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful site on the lake (water reservoir), some pines to make shade, clear water and sandy beach; difficult access, motorhomes not recommended.

title: (4880) - Unnamed Road
description: Parking of a pretty little church, with a beautiful lighting of the church at night. Parking without lamppost.

title: (5060-451) São Martinho de Anta -
description: Vantage point at a chapel surrounded by nature, with stone benches and tables, on a side street but very quiet, level pitches, good for spending the night

title: (5060) São Martinho de Anta -
description: Beautiful area with a view of the entire surrounding area, area equipped with stone table benches

title: (5000-651) Vila Real - N16 Rua de São Dinis
title_short: (5000-651) Vila Real - N16 Rua de São Dinis
description: Parking with easy access via avenida Carvalho Araujo. belvedere on the Corgo ravine.

title: (4880) Mondim de Basto - Rua da Senhora da Graça
title_short: (4880) Mondim de Basto - Rua da Senhora da Graça
description: At an altitude of almost 1000m, the view is breathtaking at 360° over the entire region. Lots of people during the day on weekends. We spent a solitary and very quiet night. It is a starting point for paragliding.

title: (4880) - Unnamed Road
description: Shaded picnic area with water

name: Camping Quinta do Rebentão
title: (5400-756) Camping Quinta do Rebentão
description: Quinta do Rebentão campsite. Very nice and cheap, restaurant and baker who leaves every morning at 9am.

title: (5000-105) Vila Real - 18 Rua Doutor Manuel de Arriaga
title_short: (5000-105) Vila Real - 18 Rua Doutor Manuel de Arriaga
description: Rangers did not allow us to camp in the nature reserve. The road to the cemetery was open and after driving around we came across this place. Bench across the street. Garbage bin nearby.

title: (4880) - EM1347
description: Picnic Area of Ponte dos Cavacos

title: (5400) Curalha - Bairro Reboreda
description: On a paved portion of the road, quiet even if you can hear a bit of cars on the new road. Stop lunch, but could very well do it for the night. Slight slope, no setvices. a shaft to take shade

title: (4880) Mondim de Basto -
description: Quiet place for one night. The descent here is a bit steep and narrow, but also manageable with larger vehicles. A little further down is a river that is safe to use for cooling off in summer. You can start various hikes from here and the trees also offer shade. The night was extremely quiet, almost no cars drive along here.

title: (5070) Sanfins do Douro - Rua do Cruzeiro
title_short: (5070) Sanfins do Douro - Rua do Cruzeiro
description: Magnificent viewpoint at the foot of a castle. No service but really quiet.

title: (5070) Sanfins do Douro - Rua do Cruzeiro
title_short: (5070) Sanfins do Douro - Rua do Cruzeiro
description: Great location for the night on the large parking lot. Chapel of Miradouro Senhora Da Piedade with a 360 ° view, bar open during the day, barbecue available as well as water taps for motorhomes, better to go through Alijo then continue north by the national then follow the signs the other type van can pass by the borough of Sanfin Do Douro

title: (5000) Vila Real - 2-17 Rua Lugar da Fraga
title_short: (5000) Vila Real - 2-17 Rua Lugar da Fraga
description: Large parking paved quiet, a few trees, perfect to rest for a night. no service, nothing to visit, just the view of the big bridge over the gorges of the little river Corgo.

title: (4890) Celorico de Basto - Unnamed Road
description: Nicely located place with tables & benches, small playground, a grill and drinking water. A path goes down to the river... The road 1.5 km (gravel) no asphalt in itself is OK but it goes steeply down and steeply up again

title: (4880) - 53 EM1204-1
description: Drinking water in Ermelo.

title: (4880) - Unnamed Road
description:
Amazing Parque/picnic area.
benches
barbecue
toilet
shade
water filling spot

title: (5070) Alijó - Unnamed Road
description: Resting place, quiet. Good solar exposure. Nice landscape. Near da Vila de Alijó.

title: (5370) Franco - 11 Largo Franco
description: The tap in the public square is available to travelers. You have enough space to park large vehicles. We have seen semi-trailers pull up in this lovely town for food. You have a restaurant but also a cafe available. The COSTA café is run by a charming couple who speak French and will offer you a pleasant moment of discovery of Portuguese culture. Possibility to buy homemade olive oil, port, honey, and grape jam. And depending on the season of the sausages. Stop doing without hesitation! :)

title: () Pardelhas - N304
description: Superb corner in Do Alvao Park. Maximum two places on this site. In the middle of nature, at an altitude of 1000 meters. Water point.

title: (5060) - 10 Rua Miguel Torga
description: Free park with lots of space

title: (4860) Arco de Baúlhe - 13 N210-1
description: Parking at the bottom of a dead end with no traffic, next to a small train museum (free). Very good for an evening and a night. Toilet open from 10h to 19h

title: (4880) Ermelo - N304
description: Space for about 4 vans on the level. At Pentecost we were alone. Place surrounded by nature. Infrastructure looks deserted.

title: (5430) - Unnamed Road
description: Visited site May 2022. A slightly odd and eerie place. Satnav took us up a very steep unmade road. At the top we found a disused and vandalised toilet block, some very old children’s play equipment and a view. No water. We didn’t stay. We left by a made up road, poor condition, past the old church which, if we had found first, we might have stayed but earlier experience put us off.

name: Quinta Rural Eco-lodge, Bungalows e Glamping de Montanha
title: (4860) Quinta Rural Eco-lodge, Bungalows e Glamping de Montanha
title_short: (4860) Quinta Rural Eco-lodge, Bungalows e Glamping de Montanha
description: Quinta Rural, is located just before the town of Juguelhe. Beautiful camping farm with fantastic views over the valley and a nice hostess. Please call in advance if you want to come.

name: Camping NaturWaterPark
title: (5000-037) Camping NaturWaterPark
description:
NaturWaterPark water park campsite.
If you enter the campsite in the evening/night, you must leave before 5:00 p.m. the next day, losing 1 hour of fun. It is recommended to enter first thing in the morning.
The emptying and filling of water are outside the campsite, in the parking lot below.

name: Quinta do Rio - Natuurcamping
title: (4890-140) Quinta do Rio - Natuurcamping
description: An incredibly idyllic campsite on a river, far away from civilisation. The last part of the path that leads there is only gravel and quite steep in some places. Also the last 3 km of directions from google maps is not correct but there are signs pointing the right way. The owner is Dutch and built everything here piece by piece, because previously there were only terraced vineyards here.

name: O Moinho
title: (5400) O Moinho
description: Near a river, in the parking lot of a restaurant where you do not have to go but you eat very well. Owners speak French and friendly. we can stay the time we want. We will come back.

title: (5460) Cerdedo -
description: A former football field, terrain is flat. Beautiful sunrise and sunset. Very quiet and good 4G reception.

title: () Mondim de Basto - EM1189
description: Free service terminal with possibility to stay 72h, attention not accessible the first weekend of August cause big party on the parking lot. Free electricity, do not overuse.

title: (4890) - 1245 N210
description: Very safe park. Near exists a market and a coffe. Exists a old railway station near and a path to Walk.

title: () - EM520
description: This is a awesome place on the top of the mountain range with a great view to the dam. There are no services, just nature. There are paths till here but the access is a little difficult for bigger vans I think, because there’s not much space to turn around. We stayed for one night, it was pitch black because there’s no light around but super calm and we felt secure. I don’t recommend it in windy days because here on top you really feel it in your motor home. But the views during the day are just breathless!

title: (4880) Mondim de Basto - 10 Rua Comendador José Augusto Álvares de Carvalho
title_short: (4880) Mondim de Basto - 10 Rua Comendador José Augusto Álvares de Carvalho
description: We went to Mondim de Basto during the first week of August.  The campers service area was closed (but possible to use the services) and we slept at this spot close to the urban park. Very quite, in the city center and with lots of entertainment for kids.

address.street: 10 Rua Comendador José Augusto Álvares de Carvalho

title: (5070) Favaios - 3 Avenida Senhor Jesus Outeiro
description: Small village at the top of the douro. We discovered it on a motorcycle in 2016, and revisited this day by motorhome for its restaurant.

title: (5000) Vila Real - E82
description: "Barragem do Sordo" Calm place with a dam surrounded by mountains. Restaurants nearby. Easy access to the highway. Beautiful spot for lunch and a swim. Road was a little steep and gravel but it you take it slow it is very achievable and heaps of space to turn at the bottom. worth it!

title: (4880) Mondim de Basto - Rua Nova
description: Parking of the cemetery behind, not perfectly flat but quiet with a nice view.

name: Camping Mondim de Basto
title: () Camping Mondim de Basto
description: Very pleasant campsite full of nature possibility of service around the toilets. no pool but possibility of swimming at the river

title: (4880-258) Mondim de Basto - 183 Rua da Quinta
title_short: (4880-258) Mondim de Basto - 183 Rua da Quinta
description: Car wash station and laundromat at the Intermarché. Ideal for parking

title: (4880) Mondim de Basto - Pont Medieval
description: Small car park allowing access to a natural swimming pool, 20m below. The place is idyllic. Please note that the street is narrow and suitable only for vans

title: (4880) Mondim de Basto - Rua Monte Nadouro
title_short: (4880) Mondim de Basto - Rua Monte Nadouro
description: Super cozy private spot, directly on the river, quiet and sorrounded by nature, stayed there for 4 nights without a problem, there is even a little "beach" in the back - very lovely spot.. Even if there is a bit of rubbish on the sides, because some people are just stupid, we just collected it, please do so too, no matter where you are :-)

title: (4880) Mondim de Basto - 236 Rua do Caminho da Ponte
title_short: (4880) Mondim de Basto - 236 Rua do Caminho da Ponte
description: Nice haven of peace. Possibility of parking at the end of the car park, or at the back, closer to the water. Slightly sloping parking. Be careful, the incline is too steep to access so cars or vans only. Access seems too complicated for motorhomes or vans. There is water but not drinkable. Possibility to swim in this beautiful river and make beautiful dives!

title: (4860) Cabeceiras de Basto - Rua Dom Nuno Álvares Pereira
title_short: (4860) Cabeceiras de Basto - Rua Dom Nuno Álvares Pereira
description: ASA serviços e pernoita autorizada. Rest area and picnic with benches and tables. Near the police. Pharmacy and hospital. Ideal for visiting the village and local commerce. Municipal swimming pools at 100 meters.

title: (4860) Cabeceiras de Basto - Alameda Camilo Castelo Branco
title_short: (4860) Cabeceiras de Basto - Alameda Camilo Castelo Branco
description: Parking in the parking area next to the bus station.Local security decorto.ercio and hospital and police 100 meters.Varia parajas de utilidade paracampers

title: (4860-350) Cabeceiras de Basto - 5 Rua de São Miguel
title_short: (4860-350) Cabeceiras de Basto - 5 Rua de São Miguel
description: Safe place to pass by or day and night. Semes serviços more com supermecados e center de saude and next muito doctors. Municipal market for purchases. Pharmacy at 20 meters. Civil guard at 100 meters. In the commercial area of Vila .... Visit vila e deixe to your trip in a perfect place

title: (4860) Cabeceiras de Basto - Unnamed Road
description: Intermarché supermarket, with fuel station

title: (4890) - N210
description: Parking near a small church in the center of a small village. We had a very quiet night. In the morning it is nice to see the beautiful panoramic view.

title_short: (4860-351) Cabeceiras de Basto - 53 Rua Barjona de Freitas

title: (5370) -
description: Beatiful climbing and take-off site for paragliders, near which it should be possible to stay the night, under the pines (no prohibitions mentioned). Superb panoramic view, however a little spoiled by the electricity poles. I still recommend it in the middle of summer because it faces the south! And watch out for the access road (4-5 km from the village of Passos) which is an unpaved forest track, lots of stones so not for low cars.

Beach is on the other side with restaurant 'Balaia Bar da Praia' / toilets. Open only in summer.

name: MICROCAMPING AT LAVOURA DA BOUÇA FARM
title: (4890) MICROCAMPING AT LAVOURA DA BOUÇA FARM
title_short: (4890) MICROCAMPING AT LAVOURA DA BOUÇA FARM
description:
Microcamping, at "farm" private terrain. At our farm you can park one or two motorhome (small size), and enjoy shade and free animals. If you have a tent can alo camp near bouças. Mostly apple, we have the best organic applejuice, no sugar or conservatives added. Also can enjoy country nature, sheep's and geese on the wild. We have a swing by the lake. Can visit and bathe at our rivermill. We have other places to park. 
for reservation please call or check the web.

title: (5430) Valpaços - Unnamed Road
description: Flat, with a little shade in the center of town. Calm and peaceful. ASA for AC at 300 meters.

description: Public toilets, right on the side of the city hall.

name: MICROCAMPING AT REQUEIXO TERRAIN
title: (4890) MICROCAMPING AT REQUEIXO TERRAIN
description: Microcamping, at "Requeixo" private terrain. Park for one or two motorhome (bigger vans), at lupine farming. Nearby "lavoura da bouça - fruta bio" farm. Can visit rivermill, bathe on river, enjoy countryside. Taste our 100% organic applejuice (no added sugar niether conservatives), and enjoy the wild sheeps, geese, swing, and other places nearby, organic products, applejuice. Also have a parked caravan for support. For reservation please call or check the website.

title: (5400-017) Chaves - 10 Avenida 5 de Outubro
description:
Large car park, which allows you to visit the center and the Roman bridge by walking about 300m along the water.
Nothing prevents you from sleeping but very attractive

title: (5400) Chaves - Avenida Doutor Mário Soares
description: Stayed on a Friday night. The car park was a combination of drag racing and rally car racing until 2am.    Possibly ok during the week.  We moved the following day!  The location is great with a short and pretty walk along the river to the old town.

title: (5060) Provesende - N323
description:
Nice picnic area on the Pinhao road after the bridge, towards Sabrosa. a shadow
 welcome, picnic tables and a refreshing breeze. we only picnicked there, but nothing prevents us from spending a discreet night there.

title: (5470) Viade de Baixo - Unnamed Road
description: Short stretch of rocky road to get there, but possible with big vans. Quiet place, all by yourself. Would definitely recommend!

title: (5470) Antigo -
description:
A truly rejuvenating and idyllic place. Quiet and beautiful.
Very passable dirt road for a van.
Very windy in July, we were very very cold despite our sweaters.

title: () - 77 EM520
description: Spectacular and calm place, surrounded by nature. You can park in various locations with various views.

name: Camping Quinta Valbom
title: (4890) Camping Quinta Valbom
description: A beautiful campsite in the mountains. One hour from Porto. Very friendly owner. Places very well maintained with a beautiful view and with orange, olive and lemon trees. The sanitary facilities are old, but clean! It's really worth it for some quiet nights in the middle of nature :) (unfortunately a very steep approach, could be a problem for big motorhomes)

name: Quinta Dos Espinheiros - Casa de Turismo
title: () Quinta Dos Espinheiros - Casa de Turismo
title_short: () Quinta Dos Espinheiros - Casa de Turismo
description: Quinta dos espinheiros. AMAZING! If you want to taste some authentic port, wine and delicious olive oil this is the place! Experience the real Portuguese hospitality, find a spot for the night on this cute property with amazing views! We stayed for free with free electricity and tons of smiles! Anna speaks a great english, french and espagnole! She knows all about the region and her wines. We stumbled upon this place (with a caravane sign) and sooo glad we went for it! Truly recommend it! don’t hesitate to help this local business and buy their product they are delicious!

title: (5030) - CM1244
description: Praia Fluvial de Fornelos, free public parking.

title: (5470) - Unnamed Road
description: Wild camping at the edge of a lake.

title: (5430) Valpaços - Unnamed Road
description: For lunch break or more, no prohibition sign, beautiful view, too bad, not very clean

title: (4860) Cabeceiras de Basto - 38 EM524
description: Sao Nicolau Cabeceiras De Basto.Praia river excellent otimas condições para lazer banho e wc picnic tables with shade.place ideal for noite e day..no verão quite moved to or near the end of the week more quiet and safe.cafe and next supermarket. High spring and verão é melhor ê next time da serra da cabreira and pedestrian courses .ha um clube that organizes trilhos of ecxcelente qualidade. Bom for quem gosta da natureza ...... TOP. 5 kms from the center of VILA DE CABECEIRAS DE BASTO with what to visit ..

title: (5470) - Travassos da chã
description: This is called a bivouac alone in the world, several possible locations, a few places on the left arriving from the side of the White Rock; much more room and flatter on the right when arriving. More windy too that day! Attention, lake level probably much higher in winter, bivouac may not be accessible!

name: Parque de Campismo de Penedones
title: () Parque de Campismo de Penedones

title: (5060-263) Provesende - 5 Viela das Pereiras
description: Small parking lot overlooking a beautiful valley. Toilets open. Amazing bar/museum next door, little cafe, little shop. We stayed for a quick stop but sure it would be OK to stay if you support the village amenities.

name: MICROCAMPING AT KIWIS-RIBAS
title: (4890) MICROCAMPING AT KIWIS-RIBAS
description: Microcamping, at "kiwis - ribas" private terrain. At ribas you can enjoy private, exclusive nature. For summer/ sunny season. With one or two places for small motorhome (van type)*. Can enjoy river with different small depths, barbecue area, small lake, cascade, kiwis shadow, solar shower, electricity. Exclusive and few people. Only reserved per group. For reservation contact first. (*if with a bigger motorhome and limoeiros house is available, you can park bigger van there, and camp on the valley. The street valley with high slope, more adaptable for smaller vans. access requires experienced driver). Can visit our farm, organic producst, applejuice, wine, rivermills, nearby.

title: (5140) -

name: Camping and Caravanning of Celorico de Basto
title: (4890) Camping and Caravanning of Celorico de Basto
title_short: (4890) Camping and Caravanning of Celorico de Basto

title: () - N103
